description: WhatsApp is said to be developing a new lockdown-style mode to enhance security for users at risk of targeted cyberattacks, according to feature tracker WABetaInfo. Spotted in the latest WhatsApp beta for Android 2.25.33.4 update on the Google Play Store, the feature will reportedly let users apply stricter privacy settings with one toggle. It includes protections like IP address masking during calls, blocking media from unknown senders, disabling link previews, and enabling two-step verification, offering stronger, simplified protection for high-risk users.
title: WhatsApp Working on 'Strict Account Settings' Feature to Protect Users From Cyberattacks: Report

description: Students who are looking for a new laptop or to upgrade their current device can check out the list of the best laptops under Rs. 50,000, which includes Asus Vivobook 14, Moto Book 60, Infinix Inbook Air Pro+, Acer Chromebook Plus 15, and Honor MagicBook X16 (2024). These laptops are capable of performing most tasks on a budget. The Asus Vivobook 14 (X1407QA), which features a 14-inch full-HD+ (1,920×1,200 pixels) IPS screen with a 16:10 aspect ratio and a 60Hz refresh rate, is powered by Qualcomm’s octa core Snapdragon X (X1-26-100) processor.
title: Best Laptops for Students Under Rs. 50,000: Asus Vivobook 14, Moto Book 60, Infinix Inbook Air Pro+, and More

description: Samsung Galaxy XR could be available in more global markets next year. The company is reportedly planning to launch the device in Germany, France, Canada, and the UK in 2026. The company's first extended reality (XR) headset could be launched in more regions based on production capacity and the growth of XR apps and experiences.
title: Samsung Galaxy XR Headset Will Reportedly Launch in Additional Markets in 2026

description: Moto G57 Power and Moto G57 have been launched in select global markets on Wednesday. They run on a Snapdragon 6s Gen 4 chipset and have a 6.72-inch display. They feature a 50-megapixel Sony LYTIA 600 rear camera and have an IP64-rated build. The Moto G57 Power packs a 7,000mAh battery, while the Moto G57 features a 5,200mAh battery.
title: Moto G57 Power With 7,000mAh Battery Launched Alongside Moto G57: Price, Specifications

description: The Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) has extended the PAN-Aadhaar linking deadline to December 31, 2025, giving taxpayers more time to complete the mandatory process. Linking PAN with Aadhaar keeps it active, prevents penalties, and helps verify identities. Users can pay the linking fee and submit their request via the Income Tax e-Filing Portal in both pre-login and post-login modes. The portal also allows checking the link status online to confirm successful completion or pending status.
title: PAN-Aadhaar Link Deadline Extended: How to Link PAN and Aadhaar Online by December 31

description: Snapchat Web offers access to the popular messaging app on your desktop browser, letting you chat, send Snaps, and make calls without picking up your phone. While Snapchat is known for features like AR Lenses and Snap Map, the web version offers a streamlined experience with some limitations. Read on for a complete guide to accessing Snapchat Web, its available features, and how to install it using your browser.
title: Snapchat Web: What Is It and How to Use Snapchat Web on Your Computer

description: A new leak suggests Qualcomm’s upcoming Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 6 chipset will debut in two versions, including a standard model and a Pro variant. Both will use TSMC’s 2nm N2P process and a 2+3+3 CPU core layout, but the Pro will feature LPDDR6 memory, a faster GPU, and enhanced AI capabilities. Expected to cost about $70 (roughly Rs. 6,200) more than the Gen 5, the Pro chip may power ultra-premium phones from Samsung, OnePlus, Xiaomi, and iQOO when it launches in 2026.
title: Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 6 Leak Hints at Two Variants Including 'Pro' Model

description: Valve is rolling out a new feature for the Steam Deck that allows the device to continue all active downloads with the display off in a new low-power mode. The new mode is currently available to users part of the Beta and Preview channels. It will be enabled by default when connected to charging.
title: Steam Deck Gets a Display-Off Low-Power Mode for Downloads Three Years After Launch

description: Realme GT 8 Pro is set to launch in India this month. Ahead of its launch, Realme's Francis Wong has published an article on X (formerly Twitter), assuring Indian consumers that the company will try to absorb the increased prices of memory and storage devices and not pass on the costs to the cusotmers. This comes after several reports highlighted that critical smarpthone components are being redirected for artificial intelligence (AI) data centers and cloud computing.
title: Realme Will Try to Absorb Increased Cost of Components Ahead of Upcoming Product Launches, Executive Says

description: Activision has revealed the PC system requirements and pre-loading times for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 days before the game's launch. The publisher has also confirmed PC handheld support for Black Ops 7. The game will be available to preload from November 10.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 PC Specifications, Preloading Times Revealed; Activision Confirms Handheld Support

description: In a joint filing in the federal court in San Francisco, Alphabet and Epic Games asked US District Judge James Donato to consider a proposal resolving Epic’s 2020 antitrust lawsuit, which accused Google of illegally monopolizing how users access apps and make in-app purchases on Android devices.
title: Google Proposes Play Store Reforms in Settlement With Fortnite Maker Epic Games

description: Apple's iOS 26.2 beta, released on Tuesday, introduces a new Enhanced Safety Alerts feature, available in the iPhone's Settings app under Notifications. For users in supported regions, tapping this option reveals toggles for Earthquake Alerts and Imminent Threat Alerts. The settings also allow users to share their approximate location with Apple to help improve the accuracy and timeliness of these alerts.
title: iOS 26.2 Beta 1 Rolled Out to Developers With Enhanced Safety Alerts, Reminder Alarms

description: The Lava Agni 4, launching in India on November 20, will succeed the Agni 3 5G. It will feature an aluminium frame, dual rear cameras, and a new side capture button. Available in Lunar Mist and Phantom Black, the phone is expected to cost under Rs. 30,000. Key specifications are expected to include a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chip, 6.78-inch FHD+ 120Hz AMOLED display, 7,000mAh battery, USB 3.1, and LPDDR5X RAM. It will come with AI features, alongside a “Zero Bloatware” experience and Free Home Replacement service.
title: Lava Agni 4 Confirmed to Launch in Two Colourways; Tipster Leaks Price Range, Key Features

description: Motorola Edge 70 has been launched in three colourways. It comes with a 5.99mm thin build and weighs 159 grams. The new phone runs on the Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset, alongside 12GB of RAM. The Motorola Edge 70 has a 6.67-inch pOLED display and carries a 4,800mAh Silicon-Carbon battery with support for 68W wired charging and 15W wireless charging.
title: Motorola Edge 70 Launched With Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 Chipset, Slim 5.99mm Profile: Price, Specifications

description: The OnePlus Ace 6 Pro Max is expected to launch in China by the end of November, with leaks suggesting it could debut globally as the OnePlus 15R. Tipster Smart Pikachu claims the phone will feature the upcoming Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset with 12GB or 16GB LPDDR5x Ultra RAM and 256GB, 512GB, or 1TB UFS 4.1 storage. Other expected specifications include a 6.7-inch 1.5K OLED display, 8,000mAh battery with 100W charging, a 50-megapixel dual rear camera setup, and a 32-megapixel selfie shooter.
title: OnePlus Ace 6 Pro Max Key Features Leaked; May Be Equipped With Up to 16GB of RAM

description: Realme UI 7.0, which is based on Android 16, has been launched globally. The company has also announced the Realme UI 7.0 public beta programme, which will allow users to download and install the firmware on their phones to give feedback, allowing the company to fix reported bugs. The new Realme UI 7.0 brings Light Glass Design to Realme phones, along with various artificial intelligence (AI)-powered features, like AI Notify Brief and AI Framing Master.
title: Realme UI 7.0 Launched With Light Glass Design, AI Notify Brief and AI Gaming Coach: See Eligible Phones, Beta Release Schedule

description: Researchers at the University of Warsaw and Emory University discovered that quantum entanglement between atoms enhances superradiant light bursts. The study reveals how interatomic forces and entanglement boost collective photon emission, providing new design rules for quantum batteries, sensors, and communication systems that can charge or respond much faster.
title: Researchers Unveil How Atomic Entanglement Enhances Light Bursts

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra is expected launch a year after the arrival of the the Galaxy S25 Ultra. Recently, the images of the purported screen protectors of the Galaxy S26 series had surfaced online, revealing the design. Now, a tipster has shared renders of the Galaxy S26 Ultra's front fascia, suggesting that the handset might sport more rounded corners than its predecessor. Expected to launch in February next year, the smartphone could be powered by an Exynos 2600 chip in some regions and Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC in others.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Spotted in Leaked Design Renders That Hint at Rounder Corners

description: Scientists recreated cosmic plasma beams at CERN to study why certain gamma rays vanish in space. The results showed the beams remain stable, suggesting ancient intergalactic magnetic fields, not beam collapse, hide the signals. The discovery provides new insight into cosmic jets and the universe’s earliest magnetic traces.
title: Scientists Recreate Cosmic ‘Fireballs’ in Lab to Solve Mystery of Missing Gamma Rays

description: A new silicon carbide-based motor drive for hybrid aircraft engines reduces size and weight while improving efficiency. Tested in a Cessna 337, the inverter allows lighter, more compact electric systems, offering better energy use and cabin space. This innovation could accelerate hybrid aircraft adoption and provide valuable hands-on experience for student engineers.
title: Silicon Carbide-Based Motor Drive Enables a Smaller, Lighter Electric Aircraft Engine

description: Moto G Play (2026) and Moto G (2026) launched in select international markets with MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipsets and 5,200 mAh batteries. They run on Android 16 and feature 6.7-inch LCD panels. The  Moto G (2025) comes with a 50-megapixel primary rear camera, while the  Moto G Play (2026) features a 32-megapixel main rear camera.
title: Moto G Play (2026), Moto G (2026) With MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Moto G67 Power 5G has launched in India with a 7,000mAh silicon-carbon battery and a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chipset. The phone will be available in the country via Flipkart and the Motorola India online store in three Pantone-curated colour options and two storage configurations. It features 8GB of RAM, which can be expanded by up to 24GB with RAM Boost 4.0. It boasts a Vegan Leather finish on the rear panel. The new Moto G67 Power 5G is equipped with a triple rear camera unit, headlined by a 50-megapixel primary shooter.
title: Moto G67 Power 5G Launched in India With 7,000mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Sony Camera: Price, Specifications

description: Sora is now available for Android smartphones in Japan, South Korea, the US, and Canada via the Google Play store. Powered by the Sora 2 AI model, the Sora app is capable of generating videos with sound from text prompts, reference images, and other videos. It also allows users to share these AI-generated videos on its Instagram Reels-like feed for others to watch, like, comment, and share. At the time of its launch, it was only available for iOS users in the US and Canada on an invite-only basis.
title: OpenAI’s Sora App is Now Available to Download on Android Smartphones

description: Redmi Turbo 5 has appeared on China’s 3C certification site, hinting at an imminent launch. A tipster claims it could debut in China this month and globally as the Poco X8 Pro. The phone is said to feature a MediaTek Dimensity 8500 SoC, a 6.5-inch 1.5K display, and a metal frame with IP68 protection. It may pack an 8,000mAh or 9,000mAh battery with 100W fast charging, marking a major upgrade over the Redmi Turbo 4's 6,550mAh cell.
title: Redmi Turbo 5 Spotted on 3C Certification Site; Could Launch Globally as Poco X8 Pro

description: The Southern Taurid meteor shower peaks overnight on November 4–5, 2025, bringing a rare “swarm year” filled with bright fireballs from Comet Encke’s debris. Skywatchers can expect slow, glowing meteors—some as bright as fireballs—despite interference from the nearly full Moon. Experts predict up to 10 visible Taurid meteors per hour under dark, clear skies.
title: Southern Taurid Meteor Shower 2025 Promises Bright Fireballs in a Rare Swarm Year

description: Amazon is accusing Perplexity of committing computer fraud by failing to disclose when its AI agent is shopping on a user’s behalf, in violation of Amazon’s terms of service, according to people familiar with the letter sent on Friday.
title: Amazon Demands Perplexity Stop AI Tool From Making Purchases

description: Apple seems to be preparing to debut a low-cost Mac laptop. The new device is likely to be designed for students, businesses and casual users. It is expected to rival the Chromebooks and entry-level Windows PCs. The low-cost Apple laptop could use an iPhone processor and a lower-end LCD panel. The screen will also be the smallest of any current Mac, slightly below the 13.6-inch one used in the MacBook Air.
title: Apple's Low-Cost MacBook Will Reportedly Launch in 2026: Expected Price, Specifications

description: The new animated special, Dr Seuss The Sneetches, where the society is divided between the Star Belly Sneetches and the plain ones and the star ones feel they are superior to the plain ones. Here two Stella and Pearl still unite to prove their friendship, watch now on Netflix.
title: Dr Seuss The Sneetches Now Available on Netflix: Everything You Need to Know

description: Japanese astronomers using ALMA data have found the universe was about twice as hot 7 billion years ago, with a temperature of 5.13 K compared to today’s 2.7 K. The finding aligns perfectly with Big Bang predictions that the Universe cools as it expands, providing the most precise mid-epoch measurement yet and reinforcing confidence in standard cosmology.
title: How Hot Was the Universe 7 Billion Years Ago? Scientists Now Have an Answer

description: WhatsApp has launched its Apple Watch app, now available for download on compatible smartwatches. Users can send voice notes, receive call alerts, react to messages, and view longer chats and history. All messages sent or received via the companion app are protected with end-to-end encryption, ensuring secure communication on the wearable device.
title: WhatsApp Launches Apple Watch App With Support for Voice Messages, Chat History and Reactions

description: Freakier Friday is an American fantasy film that is landing soon on digital screens. The movie is a sequel to Freaky Friday, released back in the year 2003.
title: Freakier Friday OTT Release Date: Know When and Where to Watch it Online

description: Starring Tejeenthan Arunasalam and Janany Kunaseelan, Usurae is a Tamil romance drama movie that has finally landed on the digital screens. The movie follows a small-town man trying to win his love by confronting societal norms, culture, and his strong-willed mother.
title: Usurae Streaming Now on OTT: Know Where to Watch This Tamil Romance Drama Movie Online

description: ChatGPT’s app connectors extend the chatbot beyond text or voice interactions, allowing users to perform tasks inside third-party apps without leaving the interface. By linking services like Spotify, Canva and Google Drive through OpenAI’s new SDK, ChatGPT can create designs, organise files or control music playback. The feature offers agentic convenience, though with access limits and user permissions required for privacy and security.
title: How to Add and Use ChatGPT With Spotify, Canva, Google Drive and Other Apps

description: Moto G67 Power 5G is scheduled to launch later today with a 7,000mAh silicon-carbon battery with 30W wired fast charging support. The upcoming handset was recently listed on the company’s website in the country, revealing its specifications in full. It will be powered by a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chip, paired with an Adreno GPU. It will also feature 8GB of RAM and up to 256GB of onboard storage. It will be available in India via Flipkart and Motorola’s website in three colourways.
title: Moto G67 Power 5G Launching Today: Know Price in India, Specifications, and Features
